{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Banana Pi |model=BPI R |revision=64 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SinoVoIP |est_release_date=08/2019 |type=single-board computer, wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7622A |cpu1_cspeed=1.35 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=eMMC |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SATA |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7622A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=MediaTek |sw_model=MT7531BE |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;MediaTek;MT6380;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os= |flags=MicroSD Card slot, SIM Card slot, Bluetooth 5.0, ZigBee, PoE |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :[http://www.banana-pi.org/product.html Product Page]
*[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi ''Banana Pi'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-R64 ''Banana Pi BPI-R64'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki]
===News=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/06/01/mediatek-mt7622-soc-with-wifi-network-accelerator-supports-4x4-802-11n-wifi-bluetooth-5/ ''MediaTek MT7622 SoC with 4×4 802.11n WiFi & BT 5.0'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/07/27/banana-pi-bpi-r64-router-board-is-powered-by-mediatek-mt7622-supports-802-11ac-wifi-poe/ ''Banana Pi BPI-R64 Board is Powered by Mediatek MT7622'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Specifications=== :;Banana Pi RPI R64 board *SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7622A @1.35GHz :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *System Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 8GB (eMMC) flash (option 16/32/64G) :MicroSD slot (up to 256GB); 1x SATA interface *Network: 5x 10/100/1000Mbps Ethernet ports *Connectivity: USB: 1x USB 3.0 port :1x GbE WAN; 4x GbE LAN ports ([[MediaTek]] MT7531BE) *WLAN: 802.11bgn 4×4, BT 5.0 ([[MediaTek]] MT7622A) *Optional: 4G module (Mini PCIe) + SIM card slot *Expansion: 40-pin GPIO header *Misc: Reset button, 3-pin header for serial console *Power Supply: 12V/2A DC power (barrel) jack :Optional PoE module with support for 12V/3A
===See also=== *[[Banana Pi BPI]] (2014) • Allwinner A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI Pro]] (2014) • Allwinner A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI R1]] (2015) • Allwinner A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI R2]] (2015) • [[MediaTek]] MT7623N *[[Banana Pi BPI R3]] (2022) • [[MediaTek]] MT7986A *[[Banana Pi BPI R4]] (2023) • [[MediaTek]] MT7988A *[[Banana Pi BPI M1+]] (2014) • Allwinner A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2]] (2015) • Allwinner A31S *[[Banana Pi BPI M2+]] (2016) • Allwinner H3 *[[Banana Pi BPI M3]] (2015) • Allwinner A83T *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Berry]] (2016) • Allwinner V40 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Magic]] (2016) • Allwinner A33/R16 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Ultra]] (2016) • Allwinner R40 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Zerro]] (2017) • Allwinner H2+ *[[Banana Pi BPI W2]] (2016) • [[Realtek]] RTD1296 *[[Banana Pi BPI M64]] (2016) • [[Allwinner]] A64 *[[Banana Pi BPI S64]] (2018) • [[Actions]] S700 *[[Banana Pi BPI R64]] (2018) • [[MediaTek]] MT7622
